publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5344 John Farquhar Munro: Landowners Preventing the Crofters’ Right to Buy—That the Parliament notes with concern increasing reports of landowners preventing crofters from buying their land by escalating the cost of the legal process through the Scottish Land Court and asks the Scottish Government to investigate this as a matter of urgency with a view to introducing measures to stop this practice by simplifying the right-to-buy process in the upcoming crofting legislation.

S3M-5344 John Farquhar Munro: Landowners Preventing Crofters’ Right to Buy—That the Parliament notes with concern increasing reports of landowners preventing crofters from buying their land by escalating the cost of the legal process through the Scottish Land Court and asks the Scottish Government to investigate this as a matter of urgency with a view to introducing measures to stop this practice by simplifying the right-to-buy process in the upcoming crofting legislation.
S3M-5344 Landowners Preventing Crofters’ Right to Buy (lodged on 2 December 2009) Peter Peacock*, Rhoda Grant*
